attributes.action: TO PASS A LAW BANNING MICROCHIPPING FOR HUMANS
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We would like a law passed by parliament banning the microchipping of human beings. I'm sure in the future the British Goverment would like everybody MICROCHIPPED. To help save the British people then this law should be passed immediately

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
